name: Salvation Distortion Scattergun
description:
Manufacturer: Preacher Armaments
Item Type: Distortion Scattergun
Size: 4
Disable an enemy's ship without damaging it with the Salvation scattergun from Preacher Armaments. With its wide spread and low rate of fire this size four scattergun is most potent at close range.
description_cn:
制造商：传教士军备(Preacher Armaments)
物品类型：畸变霰弹炮
尺寸：4
用来自传教士军备的救赎霰弹炮把敌人的飞船毫发无损地瘫痪.它的广散布与低开火速率使得此款尺寸四霰弹炮在近距离更为强劲.

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-新巴贝奇(New Babbage)-Centermass
